title: 'The most kind-hearted boy': Families pay tribute after teen couple found dead at holiday park

title: Optimized costimulatory domains boost tumor killing in CAR NK cells
desc: Researchers at the Ribeirão Preto Blood Center and the Center for Cell-Based Therapy (CTC) conducted a study using the NK-92 cell line to test new models of chimeric antigen receptors (CARs) with specific costimulatory domains, such as 2B4 and DAP12.

title: National to campaign on review of 'controversial' Hauraki Gulf commercial fishing rules
desc: Legislation last year established 12 high protection areas - but allowed commercial operators exclusive access to two of them.

title: Sky-high bills handcuffing household spending - Kiwibank
desc: Households spending more than a third more on utility bills than they did a year ago do not have much money left for fun stuff, Kiwibank economists say.
